data.title: Menu — Hope Breakfast Bar

GF = GLUTEN FREE, GFP = Gluten Free POSSIBLE, DF = Dairy Free, DFP = Dairy Free Possible,

V = VEGETARIAN, VP = VEGetarian possible, V+ = Vegan, S = Contains Sesame Seeds

* This food item is served raw or undercooked, or contains, or may contain, raw or undercooked ingredients.

Please note: Hope Breakfast Bar is not a peanut-free facility. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
